about.title: About
paragraphs: Software developer with {{workYears}}+ of work experience. I'm graduated as a Games Development technologist. I started my career programming for desktops, and today I work with web full-stack development.
I was born in Brazil and have Brazilian and German dual citizenship. Currently I'm based in Tallinn, Estonia.

I always try to update my knowledge in software development technology to improve my skills. I consider continuous learning my great virtue, not only professionally, but also in other life aspects. My main goal, aside from career growing, is to be certain I did a well-done job, and that I did my best to achieve it.

jobs.summary: Worked on a loan offers comparison web app for Lendo Denmark, where users can receive and select offers from multiple banks based on their provided data.
activities: Full-stack development in PHP and Vue.js.
Integration with banking APIs and external services such as Braze, Slack, and Trustpilot.
Database management and optimization in MySQL.
CI/CD with Travis CI, GCP Services like Compute Engine and Cloud SQL.

jobs.summary: Worked on a web app for business processes automation. Later worked on a restaurant management web app.
activities: PHP and JS Implementation of new automation tasks based on client demands.
Integration with third party APIs.
Back-end unit test code coverage.

jobs.summary: Worked on a big data web app that measures costumer satisfaction with AI and lots of data collection from different sources.
activities: SPA development in React and PHP with extensive creation and integration of own and third party REST APIs.
Back-end unit test code coverage.
Python automation scripts and microservice using Flask.
Docker containers environment, MySQL for persistent data and Elasticsearch for full text search.

jobs.summary: Worked on a web app for law offices management, including lawsuits and hearings monitoring.
activities: PHP with MVC pattern, and jQuery with Bootstrap.
Legal data integration with third party APIs and scraping of websites.
Diverse Python routine scripts, including data migration between databases and e-mail management.
PostgreSQL schemas creation and maintenance.

jobs.summary: Software engineering focused on desktop and web applications for building automation.
activities: Development of a bulding energy management software suite.
Development of a logic visual programmer with draggable blocks, including its linker, compiler and debugger.
Development of many tools for electronic equipment setups.
Database structure creation, update and maintenance.
Desktop development in C++.
Web development in PHP, JavaScript (vanilla and jQuery), HTML, CSS/SCSS, JSON and XML.

jobs.summary: Support on and programming for systems integrated with lab test equipments.
activities: Direct support for clients.
Search, analyse and identify system problems.
Qt Creator (C++) programming for software aimed at showing and collecting lab equipments data, like test results.
Bash script programming.

jobs.summary: University group for games development on the iOS.
activities: C# and JavaScript programming with Unity 3D engine.
One game released on the App Store.
Institute's site management and graphic components creation.

about.title: Sobre
paragraphs: Desenvolvedor de software com mais de 11 anos de experiência no mercado. Tenho graduação tecnológica em Jogos Digitais. Iniciei minha carreira com programação para desktop, e hoje trabalho com desenvolvimento full-stack para web.
Nasci no Brasil e tenho dupla cidadania Brasileira e Alemã. Atualmente moro e trabalho em Tallinn, Estônia.

Procuro sempre atualizar meus conhecimentos em tecnologia de desenvolvimento e aprimorar minhas habilidades. Considero o aprendizado contínuo minha maior virtude, não só na área profissional, mas também em outros aspectos da vida. Meu objetivo, além de crescimento na carreira, é de estar com a consciência tranquila de que meu trabalho foi bem feito e que me esforcei ao máximo para isso.

jobs.summary: Desenvolvimento de um aplicativo web de comparação de ofertas de empréstimo para a Lendo Dinamarca, em que usuários recebem e selecionam ofertas de múltiplos bancos baseadas nos dados fornecidos.
activities: Desenvolvimento full-stack em PHP e Vue.js.
Integração com APIs bancárias e serviços externos como Braze, Slack e Trustpilot.
Gerência e otimização de banco de dados MySQL.

Testes unitários em back-end.

jobs.summary: Desenvolvimento de um aplicativo web de big data que mede a satisfação de consumidores com IA e extensa coleta de dados de diversas fontes.
activities: Programação de SPA em React e PHP para ferramenta de medição de satisfação de consumidores
Scripts em Node.js e Python para rotinas e microsserviços web
Ambiente em contêineres Docker, MySQL e Elasticsearch
